thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Chantelle Glasson
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Chantelle Glasson

author: Chantelle Glasson
title: Chantelle Glasson
text: So happy with our purchase and so are our twins! We purchased 2 bikes with complimentary helmets and got free delivery. It's important to us to find quality at an unbeatable deal as buying for twins can quickly add up! Solid little bikes and shipped fast. Very happy!
